mapper.insert: insert into T_CHECKWORK (CW_ID, CW_SDID, CW_TIME, CW_STATE, CW_SMALLTIME,CW_DATE) values (CHECKWORK_SEQ.nextval,#{cw_sdid},#{cw_time},#{cw_state},#{cw_smalltime},#{cw_date})
mapper.select: select * from T_CHECKWORK where CW_DATE=#{cw_date} and CW_SDID=#{cw_sdid} and CW_STATE=#{cw_state}
